Earn your share of the New internet.

As AI and cryptocurrencies reshape the internet, it’s easy to get left behind.

Koii currently processes 7 million+ transactions per day, and coordinates activity across almost 100,000 compute devices around the world. 

The next generation of AI will be powered by our personal phones and computers, and the best part is, we all get paid. (More on Cloud2)[link cloud2 vision deck], 

We need the best people from around the world to help make this vision a reality. 

Install Finnie to get access to Koii VIP.
Get your first airdrop within seconds!

Security & Privacy
Finnie is a high performance web3 wallet, packed with features and secured by the best technologies on the market.

Key Features
- Airdrops, airdrops, airdrops! Install today and start your journey to becoming a Koii VIP!
- Earn airdrops every time a new token launches on Koii

The new internet is being built by the second – don’t miss this chance to get your piece.
long.vi:
Finnie is the official companion wallet of the Koii Network, enabling you to create, store, and manage digital assets that will stand the test of time. Finnie uses the Koii Network and decentralized storage to provide an immersive user experience without the limitations of typical blockchain applications. Finnie is the best cross-chain wallet for NFTs and other digital assets—mint and store your art and PFPs all in one spot.

A One-Stop NFT Shop
With Finnie installed, creating NFTs is fast, eco-friendly, and inexpensive. Within seconds, you can create permanent, cross-chain compatible NFTs that are registered on the Koii Network and ready to receive attention rewards. When you use Finnie, each NFT you create or collect will accrue rewards in the form of KOII tokens for the views it receives.

Not feeling creative?
Navigating the decentralized internet doesn’t have to be complicated. Finnie is designed to simplify things by bypassing buzzwords, and our dedicated Koii Nodes take care of all the heavy lifting in the background so that you can rest easy. 

What else can Finnie do?
- Create and Import keys on K2 (Koii’s base layer), Ethereum, Solana, and Arweave (more chains coming soon)
- Drag & Drop any file to create an NFT
- Bridge your NFTs to Ethereum, Opensea, and more 
- Send and receive KOII, ETH, SOL, AR, and any subtokens from those chains
- Send tokens to any Unstoppable Domain
- Monitor wallet activity, NFTs, and token balances
- Register any digital asset to start earning Attention Rewards in $KOII
- Design your own Decentralized ID profile page and hot link, complete with all your sharing links and an NFT gallery
- Simplified and secure cross-chain login
- Developer integrations and much more
